brief_summary.textblock: Observational study regarding the use of supplements in chronic fatigue syndrome patients

clinical_study.brief_title: Observational Research on Use of Immunoprop Supplement in Chronic Fatigue Syndrome

detailed_description.textblock:
Detailed questionnaire regarding the diagnosis of an onset of chronic fatigue syndrome and
      100 patients. using Karnofsky scale before and after use of supplements patient scores are
      compared in a double blind trial.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Fukuda criteria and Canadian consensus criteria will be the diagnosis criteria for
             patient selection

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  non inclusion in the above criteria

study_pop.textblock:
Fukuda criteria and Canadian consensus criteria will be the diagnosis criteria for patient
        selection

clinical_study.official_title: Observational Research on Use of Immunoprop Supplement in Chronic Fatigue Syndrome

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.description: Review of Karnofsky score over prior to diagnosis and subsequent to patients having taken supplements

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
